name: Army Spy Counter Attack
description:
You came to the final battle on the grounds of fury sniper mafia. All gone and you are the only commando left in this USA Army mission, surrounded by battlefield full of weapons, shooters, snipers and gangsters ready to hunt you down. You are the only hope of US Army to kill the fury sniper shooters and challenge them to attack you standing on their battlefield.

Features:

* Smooth and realistic first person shooting controls.
* Free to play without wifi or internet connection.
* Advanced level modern guns to shoot.
* Small size offline shooting game for boys, kids and girls.
* Offline play in different battlegrounds.
* High shoot range guns and assault snipers.
* Hardcore assassination adventure of enemy army soldiers.
* Real combat battle action between two military forces.
* Snipe a perfect head shoot on epic troops.
* Vivid 3D graphics for best shoot in this shooting game.
